name: .YYP File Extension
summary: Learn about .YYP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a YYP file (and its associated GameMaker Studio project) with YoYo Games GameMaker (formerly known as GameMaker Studio 2). To do so, open GameMaker and select the Open button located on the program's Start Page. Then, navigate to and open your YYP file.
If necessary, you can also open a YYP file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code or any other text editor. Doing so will allow you to view the project metadata and references your YYP file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
